Detail: Each row = 1 prompt → 1 strategy → 1 output type
Verify that every input keyword has at least one associated funnel, persona, or intent tag
Only log fallback content routing if explicitly discussed by user
Use tab-level scoping for grouping insights by content type
Link back to original tab/source in Notes if row came from source doc
Every AI suggestion must either be verified or tagged as 'unverified'
Each row may also include tooling context in Notes (e.g. GPT version, plugin used)
Rows triggered by screenshots or diagrams must link visual
Clarify if entry is meant for main site, blog, landing page, or glossary
For FAQs, flag whether it's pre-sales, technical, or onboarding
Use consistent language for job roles across all rows
Add AI hallucination warnings when user asked for non-AI interpretation
Highlight contradictions between persona × funnel × keyword triads
If row appears redundant, log and tag it with 'Duplication - Review'
No rows should link to deprecated URLs unless tagged as legacy
Every system-level behavior should be documented in Notes only
Each glossary term must map to at least one piece of content
Once every 100 rows, review for tag integrity and duplication
No funnel tags should be reused across multiple unrelated personas
Always prioritize rows based on downstream user impact
